title: Refund Policy
text: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all our products. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days of approval. Enterprise contracts have custom refund terms.

title: How to Request a Refund
text: To request a refund, log into your account and navigate to Billing > Request Refund. Provide the reason for your refund request and any relevant details. Our team will review your request within 24 hours.

title: Refund Processing Time
text: Standard refunds are processed within 5-7 business days. The time to see the refund in your account may vary depending on your payment method and financial institution.
